entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
